JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Responsibilities    As a fully contributing member of the application development team, you will be assigned to small projects or to phase(s) of larger project(s) and will be required to carry out all the SDLC activities (Analysis, CUT, debugging, build and release)     You will be using Inheritance, Polymorphism during Class/Interface Design.     Build and Promote the software to development and QA Environments     Mentor Junior Developers in both Technical and functional domains.     Apply programming tools, procedures, functions and routines towards delivering the assigned task or activity with little or no guidance.     Collaborate with Team members and Design/Development of Modules     Quickly produce well-organized, optimized, and documented source code     Continuously learn and improve skills     Attention to detail is essential and all tasks must be carried out to the highest standard     Should identify areas to improve in terms of Development Practices     Should have participated in, and be familiar with, Agile (Scrum) project methodologies    Requirements    Extensive experience in Dotnet, Dotnet Core, C# programming language,     React and Redux,     Should understand SOLID Design Principles, Design Patterns.     Strong in SQL Query Tuning and code tuning     Strong in MVC     GraphQL, WEB API,Entity Framework Core, SQL would be an added advantage
